meanings.definition: A woman who is devoted to a particular cause or belief.
meanings.sent1: The votaress dedicated her life to helping animals in need.
meanings.sent2: She is known in the community as a dedicated votaress of environmental conservation.
meanings.sent3: The votaress was so passionate about recycling that she turned her home into a recycling center.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature made her a true votaress of the Earth.
meanings.sent5: The votaress's unwavering commitment to her cause inspired many others to join her.

meanings.definition: To devote oneself to a particular cause or belief.
meanings.sent1: She decided to votaress her time to helping the homeless in her city.
meanings.sent2: Many people votaress themselves to volunteering at local shelters.
meanings.sent3: He would often jokingly say he would votaress his life to perfecting the art of making pancakes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, she would votaress her soul to creating beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent5: The young artist vowed to votaress all her energy to painting the most colorful murals in town.
